posts.postText:
Bored? 
No more!
1. Download this little program called Everest (No installation required and it has a lot of other useful functions) Here - http://www.mediafire.com/?c4hqq2ncw8qbcqb
2. Head to Operating System -> Uptime.
3. Take a screenshot of your uptime.
4. Upload and post it here!
Let's see who has the ''biggest'' life of us all  

Here's mine.

 http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/1417/everesti.jpg
